channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meta will produce its Quest 3S next-generation VR and AR headsets in Vietnam
item.description: The announcement comes as Vietnam looks to boost its attractiveness as a destination for investment by the world's biggest companies and a key part of the global supply chain.

item.title: With shares at 10-year lows, Assassin's Creed maker Ubisoft faces questions over its future
item.description: Gaming firm Ubisoft is facing questions over its future amid a lackluster games pipeline and pressure from an activist investor to sell itself and go private.

item.title: Europe’s top carmakers are struggling in China. Here’s why.
U.S. economy is on the cusp of another Roaring ’20s, says UBS
item.description: "It’s quite possible that by early 2025 only the most pessimistic investors will need rose-colored glasses to see a clear path to a Roaring ‘20s outcome." The question is how long it will last.

item.title: PayPal CEO's first year praised by Wall Street — hard part begins for struggling payments company
item.description: PayPal CEO Alex Chriss just wrapped up his first year on the job, and his company's stock had its best quarterly performance since 2020.

item.title: Opinion: Cerebras IPO points to recurring concern in AI: customer concentration
These eerily prescient words from Hollywood icon Sharon Stone might have foretold the Chappell Roan fiasco
item.description: "Nobody likes you when you have boundaries,” the Basic Instinct star said last year.

item.title: NATO's new chief will have to confront threats outside the alliance — and within
item.description: As Mark Rutte becomes NATO's new General Secretary, his leadership skills will be put to the test quickly as the bloc confronts external and internal threats.

item.title: Hasbro, Mattel have most toy shipments locked in as port strike looms: analysts
Google will invest $1 billion in Thailand to build new infrastructure for AI and cloud computing
item.description: Google's expansion in Thailand will add $4 billion to the kingdom's GDP by 2029 and support 14,000 jobs between 2025 and 2029, the company said, citing a report from consultancy Deloitte.

item.title: Tuesday's analyst calls: Ford Motor gets an upgrade, Alphabet to rally nearly 30%
CVS is reportedly reviewing its options — including a possible breakup
Sizzler offers chance for free steak for a year
item.description: But contest is only open to people in a few states.

item.title: Euro zone inflation falls to 1.8% in September, below the European Central Bank's 2% target
item.description: Euro zone inflation fell to 1.8%, below the European Central Bank's target rate, in September, flash data from statistics agency Eurostat showed Tuesday.

item.title: What’s worth streaming in October: ‘Heartstopper,’ ‘The Diplomat' and more
